sections.title: Origins and Experiments
sections.description: Milestones that shaped my obsession with measurable, story-driven growth.

narrative.heading: Hospitality instincts meet growth systems
narrative.body: Running a family restaurant taught me to read customers in real time, design experiences, and keep operations tight. That service-first mindset anchors every growth play I craft today.

narrative.heading: Designing living brands
narrative.body: I pivoted into digital design to package those insightsâ€”building Figma systems, landing pages, and motion narratives that make value propositions unforgettable.

narrative.heading: Building launch labs for founders
narrative.body: Now I partner with founders and teams to co-build launch labsâ€”embedding AI copilots, growth loops, and storytelling frameworks so revenue keeps compounding.
